channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PEN America’s Inflated Book-Ban List

item.title: Everyone thinks AI is replacing factory workers, but Amazon’s layoffs show it’s coming for middle management first
